HQ.name: High-Quality
HQ.description: A well-formed, clear, and useful question that is likely to receive good answers.

LQ_EDIT.name: Low-Quality (Editable)
LQ_EDIT.description: A question that has potential but is currently unclear, lacks details, or has formatting issues. It can be improved through editing.

LQ_CLOSE.name: Low-Quality (Closed)
LQ_CLOSE.description: A very low-quality question that is unlikely to be answered, is off-topic, or is a duplicate. It is a candidate for being closed.
